PlanetJSON.Name: A Magical Wonderland
PlanetJSON.Creator: Kristin Agcaoili
PlanetJSON.Description: This project immerses users in a terrain that changes the color of the sky. You can wander around this magical wonderland and explore the empty village.

PlanetJSON.Name: Underwater Rings
PlanetJSON.Creator: Kristin Agcaoili
PlanetJSON.Description: Users have the opportunity to fly underwater and swim through rings like a racetrack in the ocean. Try to teleport through the ocean as fast as you can!

PlanetJSON.Name: Nature
PlanetJSON.Creator: Kristin Agcaoili
PlanetJSON.Description: Nature is a relaxing experience that takes users up into the mountains surrounded by forests and grass. It is a wonderful place to relax and take a break from life's business.
